attributes.action: charge all guilty MPs with high treason for stealing from the people of this nation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea that these so called MPs can pay for luxuries under expenses and that they can forget that they have paid off their mortgage is outrageous. It is quite simply stealing! Stealing from the people of this nation! As such these people should be sent to trial for high treason against the people of this nation.

rejection.details: Government does not charge or prosecute people. That is the role of the police and CPS.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
